text:
[Verse]
Dim light breaks the night
New day
Clear in sight
Whispers of the dawn
Keep me moving on

[Verse 2]
Shadows start to fade
Colors now invade
Morning's gentle kiss
Feels like endless bliss

[Chorus]
Sunrise dream it’s my theme
Chasing rays so supreme
Every tear fades away
With the light of the day

[Verse 3]
Breeze through open blinds
Peace I finally find
Golden skies above
Wrapped in morning's love

[Bridge]
We rise
You and I
Watch the dark
It dies
Hand in hand we stand
In this promised land

[Chorus]
Sunrise dream it’s my theme
Chasing rays so supreme
Every tear fades away
With the light of the day
title: Sunrise Dream
